pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: J. Willard Marriott Library, Special Collections, University of Utah
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes scripts, sales contracts, newsletters, memos, photos, sound recordings and brochures. Snell was an announcer and script writer for KDYL, Salt Lake City, 1938-1944, a producer for KPO, San Francisco, 1945-1947, and the owner of a chain of radio stations in California and the co-developer of the all-country music radio format.
